verses.translation: May the hands of Abu Lahab[1] perish, and may he perish!

verses.arabic_text: مَآ أَغۡنَىٰ عَنۡهُ مَالُهُۥ وَمَا كَسَبَ
verses.translation: Neither his wealth nor his worldly gains will avail him.
He will burn in a Flaming Fire,
and so will his wife[2], the carrier of firewood,
around her neck will be a rope of palm fiber[3].
